mapper.select: SELECT t_codename AS CODENAME, t_guname AS GUNAME, t_title AS TITLE, t_date AS DATE, t_place AS PLACE, t_use_trgt AS USE_TRGT, t_use_fee AS USE_FEE, t_org_link AS ORG_LINK, t_main_img AS MAIN_IMG, t_rgstdate AS RGSTDATE FROM t_events ORDER BY t_id ASC
mapper.insert:
insert into t_events (t_codename, t_guname, t_title, t_date, t_place, t_use_trgt, t_use_fee, t_org_link, t_main_img, t_rgstdate)
( #{row.CODENAME}, #{row.GUNAME}, #{row.TITLE}, #{row.DATE}, #{row.PLACE}, #{row.USE_TRGT}, #{row.USE_FEE}, #{row.ORG_LINK}, #{row.MAIN_IMG}, #{row.RGSTDATE} ),
